segments.text: It's time to graduate and it's time to find a job . Susan , why do we need to find a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need to work is because we need money to live . We need money for food and clothes and to pay for our house . We need money for many different things , and only when we work , we can earn money . And work can also help us feel that we are useful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you know it's hard for a new graduate to find a job right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is really hard . But you must believe that you will find a suitable job finally . When you work , you can accumulate a lot of experience . Besides , you need to learn a lot of things while you are working .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been fed up with study .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But whether you like it or not , there â€™ s a trend of life-long study to make sure that we can keep ourselves up with the high developing society . And you need to accept this concept positively .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my . Why there are still so many things to learn after graduation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have no choice , so you'd better adjust your thoughts to be ready to learn anything at any time .
segments.speaker: S2
